section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: When present, the content of the alternate text component is displayed as alterantive text for an image that references this component.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: Processors SHOULD render the content of the alternate text component as alternative text for an image that references this component

section.title: XDITA example
section.p: The following example demonstrates the use of body in an XDITA topic.
section.pre: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE topic PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD LIGHTWEIGHT DITA Topic//EN" "lw-topic.dtd"> <topic id="franchise-intro"> <title>An innovative, attractive, and out of the ordinary concept</title> <shortdesc>Are you interested in investing with us? Welcome to our franchise information package.</shortdesc> </topic>
